languages.text: "И дарим свою кровь, свою смерть — тебе". {n}Лезвия свистят в воздухе, и алые капли окропляют залу. Почтительно склонив голову, девушка протягивает вам увесистый сверток, и остальные головы склоняются следом. По пальцам струится кровь, но никого из служителей культа это не тревожит.{/n} "Смерть прошептала твое имя. Следующие Завету Паутины присягают ново{mf|му|й} владыке и приносят положенные дары".

"And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the Tenets of the Web swear fealty to their new overlord and offer proof of their devotion."
languages.original_text: "И дарим свою кровь, свою смерть — тебе". {n}Лезвия свистят в воздухе, и алые капли окропляют залу. Почтительно склонив голову, девушка протягивает вам увесистый сверток, и остальные головы склоняются следом. По пальцам струится кровь, но никого из служителей культа это не тревожит.{/n} "Смерть прошептала твое имя. Следующие Завету Паутины присягают ново{mf|му|й} владыке и приносят положенные дары".

traits.locale_text: "And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the Tenets of the Web swear fealty to their new overlord and offer proof of their devotion."

"And we give the gift of our blood, of our death — to you." {n}The blades make a swooshing sound, and scarlet drops are scattered across the hall. The young woman bows her head reverently and hands you a hefty parcel. The others bow their heads as well. Blood trickles down the cultists' thin wrists but none are perturbed by it.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the way of Ahn'shini swear fealty to their new {mf|lord|lady} and offer the gifts that are due of them."

languages.text: « Et maintenant, nous vous offrons notre sang. C'est le don de la mort. » {n}Ils fendent l'air de leurs armes, et des rivières de sang écarlate se mettent à ruisseler sur le pont. La jeune femme incline la tête avec révérence en vous tendant un lourd paquet, tandis que ses acolytes courbent également l'échine, sans avoir l'air de se préoccuper le moins du monde du sang qui coule le long de leurs doigts.{/n} « La mort a murmuré votre nom. Les adeptes des Préceptes de la Toile jurent fidélité à leur {mf|nouveau seigneur|nouvelle seigneure} et lui présentent la preuve de leur dévotion. »
languages.original_text: "And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the Tenets of the Web swear fealty to their new overlord and offer proof of their devotion."

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, nous vous offrons notre sang. C'est le don de la mort. » {n}Ils fendent l'air de leurs armes, et des rivières de sang écarlate se mettent à ruisseler sur le pont. La jeune femme incline la tête avec révérence en vous tendant un lourd paquet, tandis que ses acolytes courbent également l'échine, sans avoir l'air de se préoccuper le moins du monde du sang qui coule le long de leurs doigts.{/n} « La mort a murmuré votre nom. Les adeptes des Préceptes de la Toile jurent fidélité à leur {mf|nouveau seigneur|nouvelle seigneure} et lui présentent la preuve de leur dévotion. »

languages.text: «Y ahora le otorgamos el don de nuestra sangre. El don de la muerte». {n}Sus dagas cantan al cortar el aire y gotas carmesíes riegan la cubierta. La joven mujer inclina la cabeza con respeto al tiempo que te hace entrega de un pesado paquete. Los demás también agachan la cabeza. Parecen ignorar la sangre que fluye por sus dedos.{/n} «La muerte ha susurrado su nombre. Los seguidores de la Doctrina de la Red juran lealtad a su nuev{mf|o señor supremo|a señora suprema} y ofrecen una prueba de su devoción».
languages.original_text: "And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the Tenets of the Web swear fealty to their new overlord and offer proof of their devotion."

La joven mujer inclina la cabeza con respeto al tiempo que te hace entrega de un pesado paquete. Los demás también agachan la cabeza. Parecen ignorar la sangre que fluye por sus dedos.{/n} «La muerte ha susurrado su nombre. Los seguidores de la Doctrina de la Red juran lealtad a su nuev{mf|o señor supremo|a señora suprema} y ofrecen una prueba de su devoción».

languages.text: “如今，我们把我们的鲜血作为礼物献给你。这是死亡的礼物。”{n}所有人手中的利刃划过空气，发出了咻咻的声音，深红色的溪流在甲板上流淌。年轻女子恭敬地低下了头，递给你一个沉重的包裹，其他人也一起低下了头。鲜血从他们的手指流下，但他们似乎并不在意。{/n}“死亡低声呼唤着你的名字。织血罗网教义的追随者向新的主人宣誓效忠，献上忠诚的证据。”
languages.original_text: "And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the Tenets of the Web swear fealty to their new overlord and offer proof of their devotion."

traits.locale_text: “如今，我们把我们的鲜血作为礼物献给你。这是死亡的礼物。”{n}所有人手中的利刃划过空气，发出了咻咻的声音，深红色的溪流在甲板上流淌。年轻女子恭敬地低下了头，递给你一个沉重的包裹，其他人也一起低下了头。鲜血从他们的手指流下，但他们似乎并不在意。{/n}“死亡低声呼唤着你的名字。织血罗网教义的追随者向新的主人宣誓效忠，献上忠诚的证据。”

languages.text: 「そして今、私たちは血の贈り物をあなた方に贈ります。死の贈り物です」{n}彼らの刃が宙を舞い、深紅の小水が甲板に流れ落ちる。若い女性が恭しく頭を下げ、重い小包を手渡した。他の者たちも真似して頭を下げた。彼らは細い指先を伝う血には無頓着なようだ。{/n}「死があなたの名をささやきました。ウェブの教義の信奉者たちは、彼らの新しいオーヴァーロードに忠誠を誓い、その証を捧げるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name. The followers of the Tenets of the Web swear fealty to their new overlord and offer proof of their devotion."

traits.locale_text: 「そして今、私たちは血の贈り物をあなた方に贈ります。死の贈り物です」{n}彼らの刃が宙を舞い、深紅の小水が甲板に流れ落ちる。若い女性が恭しく頭を下げ、重い小包を手渡した。他の者たちも真似して頭を下げた。彼らは細い指先を伝う血には無頓着なようだ。{/n}「死があなたの名をささやきました。ウェブの教義の信奉者たちは、彼らの新しいオーヴァーロードに忠誠を誓い、その証を捧げるでしょう」

languages.text: "Und nun bieten wir Euch das Geschenk unseres Blutes dar. Es ist das Geschenk des Todes." {n}Ihre klingen zischen durch die Luft, und rote Blutströme fließen auf das Deck. Die junge Frau neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf und überreicht dir ein schweres Paket. Auch die anderen neigen die Köpfe. Das Blut, das ihre Finger hinabläuft, scheint sie nicht zu beunruhigen. {/n}"Der Tod hat Euren Namen geflüstert. Jene, die nach den Grundsätzen des Netzes leben, schwören {mf|ihrem neuen Herrn|ihrer neuen Herrin} die Treue und bringen einen Beweis ihrer Hingabe dar."

languages.text: "Şimdi de sana kendi kanımızdan bir armağanımız var. Armağanımız ölümdür." {n}Bıçaklar havada şakırken güverteye oluk oluk kan akıyor. Genç kadın sana ağır bir paket verirken hürmetle başını eğiyor. Diğerleri de başlarını eğiyor. Parmaklarından akan kanı umursamıyor gibi görünüyorlar.{/n} "Ölüm bize adını fısıldadı. Ağ'ın İlkeleri'nin müritleri olarak yeni efendimize bağlılık yemini eder ve sadakatimizin kanıtını sunarız."
languages.original_text: "And now we give the gift of our blood to you. It is the gift of death." {n}Their blades sing through the air, and rivulets of crimson flow onto the deck. The young woman bows her head reverently as she hands you a heavy parcel. The others bow their heads as well. They seem unconcerned by the blood that trickles down their fingers.{/n} "Death has whispered your name.
